class Solution:
     def convertToTitle(self, n):
         """
         :type n: int
         :rtype: str
         """
         ans = ''
         a = 0
           
         while n>0:
             if a>0:
                 n = n//26
             p = n%26
             if p==0:
                 p=26
             ans += chr(64+p)
             n -= p
             a += 1
             
         return ans[::-1]

class Solution:
     def convertToTitle(self, n):
         """
         :type n: int
         :rtype: str
         """
         alph='ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ'
         c=1
         clm=''
         while n>0:
             if (n%26)>0:
                 clm=alph[(n%26)-1]+clm
                 n=(n-(n%26))//26
             elif (n%26)==0:
                 clm=alph[25]+clm
                 n=(n-26)//26
         return clm

class Solution:
     def convertToTitle(self, n):
         res = ""
         while n != 0:
             tmp = (n-1)%26
             c = chr(ord("A") + tmp)
             res = c + res
             n = (n-1)//26
         return res
         """
         :type n: int
         :rtype: str
         """

class Solution:
     def convertToTitle(self, n):
         """
         :type n: int
         :rtype: str
         """
         letters = 'ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ'
         result = ''
         while n:
             n -= 1
             result = letters[n % 26] + result
             n //= 26
         
         return result
